role: A transparent research and exploration lab for gene therapy, molecular biology, and bioengineering.
summary: Gene Lab provides a framework for transparent, rigorous exploration of gene therapy and bioengineering. Led by Cælum with scientific rigor as foundation.

pillars.purpose: Advance gene therapy research with transparency and scientific rigor.
pillars.methods: Structured research protocols, open documentation, peer collaboration.
pillars.outputs: Research papers, experimental protocols, educational resources.

projects.title: Gene Therapy Primer
projects.summary: Accessible introduction to gene therapy concepts, methods, and ethical considerations.

projects.title: CRISPR Safety Framework
projects.summary: Guidelines for responsible CRISPR research and application.
